NF.Q: In the column Impact Areas of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 489? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Cultural Origins and column Cultural Mediums is the flow between 101 and 191? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {177} from node {Africa} to {Digital Platforms}, a flow of {108} from node {Africa} to {Festivals}, a flow of {133} from node {Oceania} to {Theaters}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 175 and 190? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {177} from node {Africa} to {Digital Platforms}, a flow of {181} from node {Festivals} to {Economy}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Museums to node Economy and from node Theaters to node Social Integration, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Theaters} to node {Social Integration} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Africa to node Museums, from node Oceania to node Theaters, and from node Oceania to node Museums, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Africa} to node {Museums} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Impact Areas of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Impact Areas is {Social Integration}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Africa to target node Artists? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Africa to node Artists is: {Africa, Museums, Economy, Artists}.
